name: Phoenix Wright: Comeback & Turnabout
storyline:
In the usual Phoenix Wright style, the player comes across the new case rather unexpectedly when his big rival Franziska von Karma shows up at the Wright & Co law firm. Much to Phoenix's surprise, she is accused of murder and will soon be on trial. As a merciless prosecutor, she has already made many defense lawyers sweat, all of whom are now refusing to take on the difficult case.

Phoenix is ​​their last hope!
summary: Phoenix Wright: Comeback & Turnabout is a fan game developed by Squall for the Ace Attorney game series and takes place chronologically after the official second part of the series (Justice for All).
